alert.note: Alert for Cook (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:03AM CDT until July 10 at 7:15AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL COOK COUNTY... At 702 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Hovland, to 19 miles east of Eagle Mountain, to 6 miles north of Grand Marais, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Hovland around 715 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Tom Lake, Judge C. R. Magney State Park, Judge Magney State Park and Grand Portage Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
